It adapts to any business (one-click and recurring payments-subscription model) increasing conversation rates. Pagantis is quickly and easily integrated via a direct API (all libraries, high level of customization and strong back office to manage all activities in real time, visually and simply). Any programming language can be used and no new bank account is needed
